channel.title: More,Science & Technology on TechnoStreet
channel.description: Recent content in More,Science & Technology on TechnoStreet

item.title: Mars' crust more complex, evolved than previously thought: Study
item.description: Mars' crust more complex, evolved than previously thought: Study A new study finds the original crust on Mars is more complex, and evolved, than previously thought.

item.title: Unfortunately, there is no choice: Elon Musk on Twitter layoffs
item.description: Unfortunately, there is no choice: Elon Musk on Twitter layoffs Elon Musk on Saturday said that there is no choice other than brutally firing half of Twitter's workforce as the company is losing over $4 million a day.

item.title: Asia-Pacific faces huge 2.16 mn cybersecurity workforce shortage
